overview: This is the story of a dance choreography based on feelings of "unease, anxiety, uncertainty, and obscurity". It is about being stuck between the memory of migration and a misty view of the future; ...or, about the struggle of a group of dancers to collectively produce despite the prevailing "darkness". This is a story about the memories of those "moments that remain".
tagline: This is a story about the memory of those "moments that remain".
title: An Kalır
